channel.title: Bss-utils on Black Sphere Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Bss-utils on Black Sphere Studios

item.title: Utility Library v0.5.0 Released
item.description: v0.5.0 of the Black Sphere Studios library has been released, overhauling the namespace and the class naming scheme, with significant code cleanup. More information is available on the Github release page.

item.title: Utility Library v0.4.7 Released
item.description: v0.4.7 of the Black Sphere Studios library has been released, now with a reader-writer lock and other threading improvements. More information is available on the Github release page.
